events.message: I want to initiate a refund for the jacket I purchased last week because it does not fit me at all.
The customer's message mentions a refund request, so the case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund case to the customer service agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or damaged?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I haven’t returned the jacket yet because I was waiting for your instructions.
Thank you for the information. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email to you shortly. Once received, we will process your refund immediately.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I’ll send it back today.
We have received the jacket and processed a full refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Closing this refund case as resolved. Thank you for contacting customer support, and we hope to serve you better next time.
